import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import PopUpPhoto from "./PopUpPhoto"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import DesktopSetup from "./DesktopSetup"; import BackgroundImage from "../assets/background2.webp" import ClickSpark from "../React-Bits/ClickSpark"; import TargetCursor from "../React-Bits/TargetCursor"; function Home() { return ( <>
{/* for Home Background */}

H E L L O !

I'm Dinesh Khichar

Full-Stack MERN Developer building clean and scalable web apps.
